alert.note: Alert for Northeast Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 19 at 9:23PM PST until December 21 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...SNOW AT TIMES THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING PLUS COLD WIND CHILL VALUES... ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Anatone, Cloverland Road, Peola, and Mountain Road. * WHEN...Until Noon PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Periods of moderate to heavy snow will be possible Tuesday evening and night impacting the Tuesday evening commute.
